description: This file defines a React component 'ReportsPage' that assembles various report-related UI components such as ReportBuilder, ReportPreview, TemplateCustomizer, and buttons for exporting and scheduling reports. It manages report type state and handles user interactions like previews and export actions.

methods.name: ReportsPage
methods.description: Functional React component that renders the reports page UI, including report builder, preview, customization, and export/schedule buttons.
